options.name: array
options.label: Array
options.info: The array to push the new value into.

options.name: path
options.label: Path
options.info: If the Target Collection is an array of objects, this is the path to the value to search for

options.name: data
options.label: Value
options.info: The value to push into the array.

options.name: filter
options.label: Filter existing values
options.info: If true, the value will only be pushed if it is not already in the array.
